short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For owners of the Vidami Pedal: Unlock its power with this extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Controls:

Speed - press once for .75x speed, again for .5x speed, again for .35x speed, again for .2x speed and a last time to go back to 1x speed.

Loop - press once to set the start of the loop, press again to close the loop. Press a third time to clear the loop.

Play - press to toggle between play and pause. Hold to clear settings, clearing the current loop and setting speed to 1x. 

Back/Forward - skip back or forward 5 seconds. Hold back to skip to the start of the video. Hold forward to start fast forwarding.
